snippet: Daniel Harris said that after her mother was killed at their home in Queens, she knew that she had to be strong for her son, who was born two months later.
abstract: Daniel Harris of Brooklyn takes GED classes and has started receiving public assistance thanks to help from Opportunities for a Better Tomorrow, beneficiary agency of Community Service Society.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Harris said that after her mother was killed at their home in Queens, she knew that she had to be strong for her son, who was born two months later.

headline.print_headline: A Teenager’s Course, Altered by Motherhood
